mapper.sql: id, xiaodai_userid, month, call_phone_number_count, two_way_phone_number_per, call_count, calling_count, calling_duration_time, called_count, called_duration_time, sms_count
mapper.update: update communication_month_info set xiaodai_userid = #{xiaodaiUserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, month = #{month,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, call_phone_number_count = #{callPhoneNumberCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, two_way_phone_number_per = #{twoWayPhoneNumberPer,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, call_count = #{callCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, calling_count = #{callingCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, calling_duration_time = #{callingDurationTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, called_count = #{calledCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, called_duration_time = #{calledDurationTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sms_count = #{smsCount,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from communication_month_info where xiaodai_userid=#{arg0} order by month desc
